changeSet.author: Grigogiev Alexey
changeSet.sql: update user_tbl set user_role = 1, user_role_text = 'NEED_SETTING' where chat_id in(188745369, 968518965, 1010052269, 1041167280, 1279017832); update user_tbl set user_role = 2, user_role_text = 'EMPLOYEE' where chat_id in(6166184036, 6619162062, 6678935766, 7590034099, 799008767);
